org.teatrove.teaservlet
Interface TeaServletEngine

All Superinterfaces:
ApplicationConfig, Config, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
All Known Implementing Classes:
TeaServletEngineImpl, TeaServletEngineImplDev
public interface TeaServletEngine
extends ApplicationConfig

This interface allows other servlets to create TeaServletTransactions. When the TeaServlet is initialized, it adds an attribute to its ServletContext named "org.teatrove.teaservlet.TeaServletEngine". The attribute's value is a TeaServletEngine array. The number of array elements matches the number of times a TeaServlet is configured in. Use TeaServletEngine's name to distinguish between different instances.

Servlets that request a TeaServletTransaction should generally let all output be handled by it. This is because it will try to set headers and use a servlet output stream.

Author:
Brian S O'Neill
